page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT IN ABBOTSKERSWELL
page.content: We did a survey in our primary school to see where the mothers and fathers work. Most of the fathers (28%) work in Newton Abbot.Quite a lot of the fathers work in Paignton and Torquay (11%) in each and 2% of the fathers are unemployed. Half of the mothers are housewives. 19% of them work in Newton Abbot. 16% of them work in Abbotskerswell. Other parents work in other centres and some move around, e.g.district nurses. Unemployment generally in the area is over 13% in mid 1985 and we think the reason our sample shows less is because most of our parents are in their thirties and our survey did not include younger or older people. Very few parents work in the village and so it has a very great role as a dormitory community.
